column2: account.  We consider a  term of imprisonment for 15 years would meet the
ends of justice.  We further  make order that it should start to  run from  the

column1: date of his conviction, which is 05.08.2014.

column2: the  appeal  of  the  Appellant  is  dismissed

column1: subject to  the variation on the basis of lesser culpability and sentence.
